You could also become a financial analyst, which involves using mathematical models to make investment decisions.

text.text: where can I get the courses

text:
There are a few different places where you can find courses on financial analysis. One option is to search for courses online. Another option is to check with your local community college or university. You could also find courses through online learning platforms like Coursera or edX.

text.text: can you suggest some local communities

text:
